snippet.title: Rational Root Theorem
snippet.description:
How to use the Rational Root Theorem to narrow down the possible rational roots of a polynomial.  You can then test these values using synthetic division to see if they are roots of the polynomial.

0:10 What is the Rational Root Theorem p/q
0:58 List of the Possible Rational Roots
2:53 Synthetic Division to Test the Possible Rational Roots
4:32 Factoring to Find the Remaining Zeros
5:02 Writing the Polynomial in Factored Form
5:27 Graphing the Polynomial

Related Videos:

How to Do Synthetic Division
https://youtu.be/ImnOzLvPBlU

Descartes Rule of Signs
https://youtu.be/nTjnon4W8Sg

Upper Bound and Lower Bound
https://youtu.be/ytI2jXM2WtQ
